divs: sighting detailsnot certain of the date, oct. 1, 2 or 3rd. about 6pm, i was walking my dog. i heard jet aircraft and looked west at the sound. i saw this luminious cloud with the aircraft flying by it. my first thought was ha, someone called in a ufo report on a lenticular cloud. then i was puzzled because the cloud was too low and too bright to be a lenticular cloud in a beautiful, clear blue sky. one of the planes i could tell it was a jet fighter by the radically swept back wings then seemed to fly straight at the cloud and it surprised me as the cloud was bright and seemed like a form of energy or something. as the fighter got close, the angles changed, and the plane went 150 to 200 ft. below the cloud. the clouds edges were very defined, not fuzzy, and it was about 4 1\2 times as long as it was thick, and almost horizontal when first witnessed. the color was something i have never seen, possibly best described as a silver blue. the color was perfectly even throughout, not lighter or brighter along the edges, nor darker in the center. it was bright in the daytime sky. no additional lights were seen. after the close flyby of the plane, the cloud began a slow rotation from the horizontalto a vertical position, taking 30 sec. to a minute, and began moving in a straight line to the west, on its edge or end. i assumed it to be disk shaped while looking at it, but realized later it could have been a disk or triangle seen edge on, or even a cigar shape. the lines along the length were very straight and the ends were curved. it was at least six times as long as the fighters flying close by. one of the planes left the site and flew near my house at about 1500 ft. altitude. i looked closely at the plane and identified it as a dark charcoal-gray colored f-16. the f-16s heading was e-se. there were still two f-16s flying back and forth from north to south between me and the cloud while the cloud continued moving west. the air was calm, at least at ground level. the other two f-16s never flew towards the cloud, always back and forth behind it, seemingly checking the atmosphere the cloud passed through, staying14 to 12 mile behind it. the event lasted at least 15 to 20 minutes. i watched the cloud until it was very small, bb sized, and the f-16s were still flying back and forth behind it. i could no longer make out the planes, but could still see their exhaust highlighted by the setting sun, appearing orange-yellow. the cloud remained a silver-blue like color, with no hint of orange. it was by then very low above
